item.title: An Introduction to High Energy Physics
item.description:
Hey guys! This past semester, I dove deep into a research project in Professor Deepa Thomas’s lab at UT Austin, where her group specializes in Quark Gluon Plasma (QGP). This post aims to give readers a overview of particle physics theory. After, be sure to give my Pythia studies a read to see how we can use particle collision data to probe at these theories!

The Standard Model

In physics, all known interactions between matter and energy can be attributed to the four fundamental forces of nature.
